definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The receptive apex of the pistil of a flower, on which pollen is deposited at pollination.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊花柱頂部，授粉時花粉被旋轉於此。

sentences.english: Depart to Pena palace at the top of Sintra mountain.
sentences.chinese: 出發前往辛特拉佩納宮山的頂部。

sentences.english: Divided into two sub-type mold, plastic parts in the top and vertical center.
sentences.chinese: 模具分爲兩次分型，分別在塑件頂部和豎直中心。

sentences.english: He showed her the top edge.
The building is topped with a flat, landscaped roof that can be accessed via an exterior staircase.
sentences.chinese: 建築頂部是可以通過外部樓梯進入的水平景觀屋面。

sentences.english: I then soldered up the top and bottom of the boiler.
sentences.chinese: 當時我焊接起來的頂部和底部鍋爐。

sentences.english: You can also brush the roof of your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以刷下口腔的頂部。

sentences.english: The rear door hinges/is hinged at the top so that it opens upwards.
sentences.chinese: 後面的門是在頂部鉸接上的，以便可以向上開。

sentences.english: The brake lever axle hole should be pointing towards the top of the kingpin.
sentences.chinese: 制動杆的軸孔應指向對主銷的頂部。

sentences.english: The hypocenter and Atom Bomb Dome are visible at top center.
sentences.chinese: 在震源和原子彈圓頂可見頂部中心。

sentences.english: Structures were frequently built on top of the mounds.
sentences.chinese: 在mounds的頂部在建類似的結構。

sentences.english: The wind tower is a system for capturing air currents with openings at the top facing the prevailing winds.
sentences.chinese: 風塔是一種頂部開口，面向主風，捕捉氣流的系統。

sentences.english: It was octagonal-shaped, thin, and the top was a carved design of two snakes.
sentences.chinese: 這是八角形，薄，頂部是一個雕刻設計的兩蛇。

sentences.english: Three helipads are on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 大廈頂部有三個直升機停機坪。

sentences.english: The ACL is a ligament that connects the top and bottom portions of the knee.
sentences.chinese: 前側交叉韌帶是連接膝關節頂部和底部的韌帶。

sentences.english: The top flap is then flipped back up into place.
sentences.chinese: 然後將貼膜頂部翻轉回原來的位置。
